channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Monarch Tractor preps for layoffs and warns employees it may ‘shut down’
item.description: The memo that went out Thursday, which TechCrunch obtained, says the "timing" of the company's pivot away from tractor manufacturing puts it at risk.

item.title: A fire in southwestern Japan damages 170 homes and forces evacuations
item.description: Firefighters and army helicopters battled a fire that burned through old wooden houses in a fishing town in southwestern Japan.
